channel.title: Opentype on Laura Kalbag
channel.description: Recent content in Opentype on Laura Kalbag

item.title: Interview about web fonts on Type Quest
item.description:
A few months ago Tyler Sanguinette sent me some questions about design and web typography as part of his thesis on web fonts. Recently I found that he’d published the interview, and interviews with a load of very smart people, on the Type Quest website. Type Quest also has some really useful information on the OpenType features of web fonts, so it’s well-worth a look.
One comment Andy Warburton at 17:40pm

item.title: Typography and the web at Ampersand Conference
item.description: I’ve written a big old writeup for ubelly from my notes at Ampersand conference earlier in the month. This was an event I decided not to live-tweet, as the content is usually more involved and in-depth, making for a better big writeup and less tweetable quotes. Typography and the web at Ampersand conference
